topic.title: Function Export
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase provides an option to export Functions as a JSON document. Using the export and import options, you can port defined Functions from your Test-to-Test, Test-to-Production, or Production-to-Production environments.

ol.li: From the Couchbase Web Console > Eventing page.
Select a Function to export. Click on the Function to view additional controls.

Click Export. The Function definition gets exported to your system.
A sample exported file for the enrich_ip_nums function demonstrated in Example 1 {x-ref Example 1 } is shown below. Ensure that you refrain from editing an exported file before importing the file back to the Couchbase cluster.
